## ProductAttributeSortInput interface

ProductAttributeSortInput specifies the attribute to use for sorting search results and indicates whether the results are sorted in ascending or descending order. It's possible to sort products using searchable attributes with enabled 'Use in Filter Options' option

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ProductAttributeSortInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [name?](./magento-api.productattributesortinput.name.md) | Maybe&lt;[SortEnum](./magento-api.sortenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Attribute label: Product Name |
|  [position?](./magento-api.productattributesortinput.position.md) | Maybe&lt;[SortEnum](./magento-api.sortenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Sort by the position assigned to each product. |
|  [price?](./magento-api.productattributesortinput.price.md) | Maybe&lt;[SortEnum](./magento-api.sortenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Attribute label: Price |
|  [relevance?](./magento-api.productattributesortinput.relevance.md) | Maybe&lt;[SortEnum](./magento-api.sortenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Sort by the search relevance score (default). |
